name: Zap Star
description:
This is an action packed platformer made by a ten year old! Everybody except me thinks that it is really hard so be warned! I tried to go retro with it but it turned into a sci fi the more I thought about it. Please do not sell this game.

Website: https://eugene.web.lord.farm/zapstar/

Discord: https://discord.gg/3nVBR6Rqns
